actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to repeal the special tariff treatment accorded to articles assembled abroad with components produced in the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to delete the tariff provisions: (1) for products of the United States which are assembled abroad; and (2) for metals exported for additional processing and returned for further processing in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to repeal the special tariff treatment accorded to articles assembled abroad with components produced in the United States.
